description: Huckabee Supporters Raise $8 Million in First 2 Months of Campaign
title: Huckabee Supporters Raise $8 Million in First 2 Months
title_page: Huckabee Supporters Raise $8 Million in First 2 Months
text:
GOP presidential candidate former Arkansas Gov. Mike Huckabee (R-AR) has raised roughly eight million dollars since launching his campaign about two months ago, on May 5.
A senior campaign advisor told Breitbart News the $8 million comes from the presidential campaign committee and affiliated committees.
According to the advisor, it’s more than three times as much as Huckabee raised in the first three quarters combined during his 2008 campaign. Huckabee was outspent 10 to one in 2008 but still managed to win the Iowa caucuses and seven other states.
Two million dollars – from the campaign committee – includes only primary election money.
Affiliated committees raised close to six million dollars, so the total reaches just about eight million dollars raised thus far by Huckabee supporters from all 50 states, with the average contribution being $101 dollars.
